com.saptarshidebnath.lib.processrunner.configuration

Class Configuration.ConfigBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.saptarshidebnath.lib.processrunner.configuration.Configuration.ConfigBuilder
  • Enclosing class:
    Configuration

    public static class Configuration.ConfigBuilder
extends Object
    Configuration.ConfigBuilder helps in composing a Configuration.

    The Configuration can be composed using the Configuration.ConfigBuilder.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ConfigBuilder

        public ConfigBuilder(String interpreter,
                     String command)
              throws ProcessConfigurationException
        The constructor for Configuration.ConfigBuilder. The only required parameters are the String interpreter and the String command.
        Parameters:
        interpreter - as String for example "bash", "cmd.exe /c"
        command - as String for example "echo 'I solemnly swear I am up to no good'"
        Throws:
        ProcessConfigurationException - is thrown if the interpreter or the command is null or empty String

    • Method Detail

      • setParam

        public Configuration.ConfigBuilder setParam(String param)
                                     throws ProcessConfigurationException
        Add a String parameter the the command to be executed.
        Parameters:
        param - as String
        Returns:
        the Configuration.ConfigBuilder
        Throws:
        ProcessConfigurationException - if the parameter is null or an empty String.

      • setParamList

        public Configuration.ConfigBuilder setParamList(List<String> paramList)
                                         throws ProcessConfigurationException
        Add a List parameter of type String to the command to be executed.
        Parameters:
        paramList - as List of type String. The order of the parameters are maintained.
        Returns:
        the Configuration.ConfigBuilder
        Throws:
        ProcessConfigurationException - if the parameter is null or an empty String.

      • setWorkigDir

        public Configuration.ConfigBuilder setWorkigDir(Path workingDir)
                                         throws ProcessConfigurationException
        Set the current working Directory as Path.
        Parameters:
        workingDir - accepts Path current working directory
        Returns:
        the Configuration.ConfigBuilder
        Throws:
        ProcessConfigurationException - if the working directory is not a directory or it doesn't exist.

      • setMasterLogFile

        public Configuration.ConfigBuilder setMasterLogFile(File masterLogFile,
                                                    boolean autoDeleteFileOnExit)
                                             throws ProcessConfigurationException
        Set the master log file as File.

        Master log file is a File where all the logs are stored by default. If the Configuration.masterLogFile is not set, the logs are not store anywhere and are discarded.

        Parameters:
        masterLogFile - accepts a File reference as master log file.
        autoDeleteFileOnExit - accepts a Boolean flag to determine if the master log file is going to be auto deleted or not on JVM exit.
        Returns:
        the Configuration.ConfigBuilder
        Throws:
        ProcessConfigurationException - is thrown if the File object passed refers to a * directory or is a read only file

      • setMasterLogFile

        public Configuration.ConfigBuilder setMasterLogFile(File masterLogFile,
                                                    boolean autoDeleteFileOnExit,
                                                    Charset charset)
                                             throws ProcessConfigurationException
        Set the master log file as File with Boolean autodelete and Charset.

        Master log file is a File where all the logs are stored by default. If the Configuration.masterLogFile is not set, the logs are not store anywhere and are discarded.

        Parameters:
        masterLogFile - accepts a File reference as master log file.
        autoDeleteFileOnExit - accepts a Boolean flag to determine if the master log file is going to be auto deleted or not on JVM exit.
        charset - a reference of Charset class to set in which chaset the output file is going to be written.
        Returns:
        the Configuration.ConfigBuilder
        Throws:
        ProcessConfigurationException - is thrown if the File object passed refers to a directory or is a read only file

      • enableLogStreaming

        public Configuration.ConfigBuilder enableLogStreaming(boolean logStreamingEnabled)
        Enable or disable log streaming. Please note that streaming will happen or not depends if the SLF4j finding the logging framework binding and the current log level set for that particular logging framework. All the log streaming will happen in the level equivalent to Level.INFO
        Parameters:
        logStreamingEnabled - a reference of PrintStream
        Returns:
        the Configuration.ConfigBuilder

      • build

        public Configuration build()
        Builds the Configuration object and returns it back.
        Returns:
        a reference to the Configuration object created.
